Keypop Calypso Crypto Legacy SAM API - 0.3.0-SNAPSHOT
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam
    Components used in applications to manage Calypso Legacy SAMs.
    org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam
    Calypso Legacy SAM data structures and selection API.
    org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.transaction
    Calypso Legacy SAM transaction API.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam used by org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam 
    Class Description
    LegacySam
    Extends the SmartCard interface of the "Keypop Reader API" to provide additional functionality specific to Calypso legacy SAMs.
    LegacySamSelectionExtension
    Extends the CardSelectionExtension interface of the "Keypop Reader API" to provide means to define optional commands to be executed during the selection phase such as the "Unlock" command.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam used by org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam 
    Class Description
    KeyParameter
    POJO containing the parameters for a key managed by SAM, whether it's a system key or a work key.
    LegacySam.ProductType
    All Calypso SAM products supported by this API.
    LegacySamSelectionExtension
    Extends the CardSelectionExtension interface of the "Keypop Reader API" to provide means to define optional commands to be executed during the selection phase such as the "Unlock" command.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.sam used by org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.transaction 
    Class Description
    LegacySam
    Extends the SmartCard interface of the "Keypop Reader API" to provide additional functionality specific to Calypso legacy SAMs.
